findings.title: Unprotected initializer
findings.description: The initializer is not protected, allowing anyone to call it and potentially causing unintended behavior.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The smart contract may allow an unauthorized user to upgrade the script, potentially leading to unintended behavior or security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function does not have any access control or protection mechanism, allowing unauthorized users to perform transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function does not have any access control or validation checks, allowing unauthorized users to call it and potentially drain the contract's funds.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function is not protected, allowing unauthorized access and potential token theft.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function can be exploited by an attacker to drain the allowance of a user's tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected _transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function is not protected and can be accessed by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized token transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected _mint function
findings.description: The _mint function is unprotected and can be exploited by unauthorized users to mint tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected _burn function
findings.description: The _burn function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected _approve function
findings.description: The approve function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it unprotected.

findings.title: Unprotected _setupDecimals function
findings.description: The internal function _setupDecimals is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes to the decimals of the token.

findings.title: Unprotected _beforeTokenTransfer function
findings.description: The internal _beforeTokenTransfer function is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected renounceOwnership function
findings.description: The renounceOwnership function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized changes in ownership.

findings.title: Unprotected transferOwnership function
findings.description: The owner can transfer ownership without any restrictions, which constitutes an elevated impact to smart contract's safety and security.

findings.title: Unprotected distributeCAKEDividends function
findings.description: The distributeCAKEDividends function has been declared as public and can be called by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized access to sensitive functionality.

findings.title: Unprotected withdrawDividend function
findings.description: The withdrawDividend function is declared as public and does not have any access modifiers or restrictions, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected _withdrawDividendOfUser function
findings.description: The withdrawDividend function is declared as public and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected dividendOf function
findings.description: The dividendOf function is public and lacks access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected withdrawableDividendOf function
findings.description: The withdrawableDividendOf function is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected withdrawnDividendOf function
findings.description: The withdrawnDividendOf function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers or restrictions, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected accumulativeDividendOf function
findings.description: The accumulativeDividendOf function is unprotected and can be accessed publicly without any restrictions.

findings.title: Unprotected _setBalance function
findings.description: The _setBalance function is accessible by anyone and lacks proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to modify balances.
